abstract:
This paper deals with the state estimation for max-plus linear systems.
This estimation is carried out following the ideas of the observer
method for classical linear systems. The system matrices are assumed to
be known, and the observation of the input and of the output is used to
compute the estimated state. The observer design is based on the
residuation theory which is suitable to deal with linear mapping
inversion in idempotent semiring.
